Question
========
  
Based on a random sample from a population, one finds as 95% confidence interval for $\mu$ [18.70, 21.30]. Suppose the sample size is increased, all other conditions remaining the same. Does $\mu$ = 21.4 for the same sample mean found, then also outside the new 95% confidence interval?

  
Answerlist
----------
* That depends on how that shifts the interval.
* Yes.
* No.
* That depends on how much the sample size is increased.
